title: YD Sign Centre
author: YD Sign Centre
created_time: April 05, 2023, 05:01:30 PMLast edit: April 05, 2023, 05:24:41 PM by YD Sign Centre
content: We are very happy to announce that we are launching a new feature from chatezy. Tipping feature. Someone can share AUD, AUDE, and AUDB in each post of someone they like.We aim to bring out new creators and influencers on our platform, who will make an impact on chatezy's social media platform.All users can share their daily experiences on chatezy. With Chatezy, users can be creative and benefit from creating written and video content such as articles, poetry, rhymes, comedy, news, vlogs, innovation, education, and others.How to tip a user?Chatezy is a social media platform where buyers and sellers can connect, collaborate and grow. The community is open for anyone who wants to do business or just hang out with friends. Anyone can join the community of Chatezy.Once they join Chatezy, they will get notified of the latest events happening on Aussie Digital. Besides, the platform will help small businesses unlock new ways through which they can promote their products and services interactively, such as paid ads. Chatezy brings a new and unexplored world of exciting growth opportunities for small businesses!Join us at chatezy.ioChatty and Eazy
